name: Site/ Store Policies
description:
Babi Doll Hair Co., LLC (CERRS)
CANCELLATION, EXCHANGE, RETURN, REFUNDS POLICIES AND SATISFACTION GUARANTEES

TERMS & CONDITIONS
PLEASE READ THIS AGREEMENT CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS WEB SITE OR ANY OTHER BABI DOLL HAIR CO., LLC SITES OR PURCHASING ANY PRODUCT OR SERVICES FROM BABI DOLL HAIR CO. LLC

This Agreement (the “Agreement”) is made between BABI DOLL HAIR CO., LLC, a Florida Limited Liability Corporation DBA Babi Doll Hair Co., BDH, Babidollhairco.bigcartel.com, babidollhair.com (“Babi Doll Hair,” the “Company,” “we” or “us”) and you the Babi Doll Hair Distributor, Consumer, Retailer, Salon, and Licensed Cosmetologist. This Agreement sets forth the legal terms and conditions for your use of this web site and any other company site(s), BDH Parties, BDH Party Participants, BDH Social functions/ events and for your purchase and or use of any Babi Doll Hair goods, services or in connection with the Babi Doll Hair business opportunity (collectively referred to hereinafter as, “Offerings”). This Agreement also provides information on how to become a Babi Doll Hair Independent Distributor.Your use of Babi Doll Hair’s web site(s), including all web pages (collectively, the “Site”) and all information, data, text, software, information, images, sounds or other materials (collectively, the “Content”) contained therein, or your use or purchase of any other Offerings confirms your acceptance of this Agreement and is subject to your continued compliance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

If you are dissatisfied with the Site or other Offerings, your sole and exclusive remedy is to stop using the Site or other Offerings, except as otherwise expressly stated in this Agreement (Babi Doll Hair Customer Guarantee).

Customer Satisfaction Guarantee:

Babi Doll Hair Co. guarantees the quality of any product which carries the Babi Doll Hair name and certifies that the products manufactured for it meet high standards of quality for our Customer’s use. We are confident that our retail Customers will find our products satisfactory in every way. BDH Hair Extensions warranties are limited in that hair is guaranteed as advertised so long as it remains in its natural state. Hair is not guaranteed or warranted once installed on the end user, if it has been color, dyed, altered or intentionally damaged or misused. All exchange products must be returned and in salable or perfect condition and in accordance with BDH Return and Exchange Policy. Given the personal nature of the hair collections, hair products, eyelashes, and hair attachment tools there is a NO REFUND POLICY on any hair, hair extensions, hair products, eyelashes, etc.
Colors BDH has done our best to accurately display the colors of our products on our website. However, because the colors you see will appear differently depending on your monitor and settings, we can’t guarantee it will exactly match. When you receive your purchase, please make sure the color of your item is correct before opening the packaging. BDH Virgin Remy Hair comes in the donor’s natural black to brown hair color.  Each hair weft/bundle is provided by a different donor. We do our best to match hair color, and texture etc. as closely as possible for multiple bundle orders to provide better consistency of appearance when installed on the customer. We cannot guarantee 100% color match between hair wefts/ bundles due to the nature of each weft/ bundle of hair coming from different human donors.

Disclaimer:

All products purchased on babidollhairco.bigcartel.com, Babidollhair.com and or using Babi Doll Hair Sales Representatives, BDH Affiliates/Partners, Licensed Cosmetologists, Salons and Retailers are sold “as is”; in the condition sold. Due to the nature of the product, different batches of human hair may perform differently than others. Also, the skill level of the technician installing the hair, technique used, daily care, heat styling, and products used may affect the longevity and performance of human hair greatly. For these reasons, the manufacturers of our products sold on babidollhairco.bigcartel.com, babidollhair.com, BD Hair Parties, Babi Doll Hair Distributors, Licensed Cosmetologists, Salons, and Retailers do not offer a warranty on these products.
If you are interested in returning hair in brand new condition, which has not been opened, please refer to our Returns & Exchanges policy prior to sending any orders back. Our products are specifically designed for use by experienced, licensed cosmetology professionals. We assume that anyone using our products has enough knowledge and experience due to the fact that we are not responsible for results obtained through improper use. Babi Doll Hair Co., LLC, Babidollhair.com; babidollhairco.bigcartel.com reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. For this reason, we encourage you to review these terms and conditions each time you visit our Website or schedule or participate in a Babi Doll Hair Party.

Babi Doll Hair Company, Representatives and affiliated companies operate as a Specialty Company in part or in whole. Therefore, hair extension orders and BDH Extension Party Orders, Wholesale Orders, BDH Party and/ or Specialty Orders, etc. may and or will be made to order in part or in whole. This may result in additional order processing time. 

Modifications:

We reserve the right at any time to:
Change the terms and conditions of this Agreement; Enhance, add to, modify or discontinue the Site or other Offerings, or any portion of the Site or other Offerings, at any time in our sole discretion.
Any changes to this Agreement will be effective immediately upon written notification which may be provided to you via e-mail or by display on the Site (hereinafter, “Notice”). Your use of the Site or other Offerings after such Notice will be deemed acceptance of such changes. Be sure to review this Agreement periodically to ensure familiarity with its most current version. The Site or other Offerings, in whole or in part, may be enhanced, modified or discontinued at our sole discretion. Any enhancements, additions or modifications to the Site or other Offerings will be subject to this Agreement.

Return Exceptions:

Due to the nature of our product, health and hygienic standards, hair extensions are not returnable and are nonrefundable items once purchased. Additionally, hair extensions that have been worn, or altered in any manner will not be accepted for return or exchange; NO EXCEPTIONS. 

Cancellation Policy:

Customers have [24] hours to cancel their order from the date/time order is submitted with payment. All refund requests must be placed in writing and submitted within 24 hours of order to receive a refund.  There will be no refunds for any requests submitted after the established time noted above. 


Refund Exception:

We reserve the right not to issue a refund with in the 24 hour cancellation window if we have submitted your order to our manufacturer for fulfillment. A confirmation email / invoice or handwritten invoice will be sent/ given to customer upon order and deposit or payment submission and acceptance.


Refund Request:

Please send an email stating the reason for the refund request to babidollhair@gmail.com and we will assign you a file number. Attach copy of your original receipt. 

Dispute Notification:

Please email all Disputes to babidollhair@gmail.com or our business office Babi Doll Hair Co., LLC 244 Bilbao Street, Suite 507, Royal Palm Beach, FL 33411. A file number will be assigned to your dispute and an initial email confirmation acknowledging receipt of your Dispute will be sent as a reply to the customer’s email address on file and or the email address where the dispute notice is generated. 

Restocking Fee:

All orders are subject to a 25% Restocking/ Cancellation fee, this will be deducted from your refund. We also do not refund the original shipping and handling paid on the order. 
Undeliverable Orders and Delivery Refused Orders are subject to a 25% restocking, Repackaging fee and additional shipment, courier or freight costs.

Exchanges:

Exchanges will be honored only for the following reason: 

Notification must be in writing and emailed to babidollhair@gmail.com within 48 hours of receiving hair extension delivery. If the Hair extension order you receive is different from what you ordered according to your invoice or online order submission, BDH will be happy to exchange your hair extension for correct style, length, texture and / or color. You will not be subject to a restocking fee. You will need to mail items back at your cost; however return postage will be at the expense of BDH to mail corrected items back to you.  Hair extension must be in its original, unused condition to be returned. You must return the hair extension within 5 calendar days of delivery.  

Delivery Refusal / Undeliverable Order(s):

Please note Undeliverable Orders and/or Refusal of initial delivery does not constitute or in any way, shape or form or create exceptions to ownership and obligation of hair ordered and paid for by Customers, Licensed Cosmetologist, Salons, and Retailers.  Babi Doll Hair Co. reserves the right to mail hair extensions, eye lashes, and other hair products ordered, as agreed; once and only once to our Customers. Once we have attempted delivery by mailing items to our Customers, we have met our delivery obligations and the consumer has used all funds charged and paid for the initial shipping and handling their order. Any additional shipping, handling and restocking charges incurred to restock (25% of the total order less taxes), repackage, and re-ship; mail, courier, or hand deliver an order that was Undeliverable; at no fault of Babi Doll Hair, or previously refused by a “Customer” will be at the expense of that Individual Customer, Licensed Cosmetologist, Salon, or Retailer. 

We will send one email and one written notice via USPS to the respective Customer within 3 business days of receipt of the returned package(s). We will to notify the Customer that their package was returned to us and, if known, the reason for the return. The Customer has 30 calendar days from the date of delivery of the email notice to contact Babi Doll Hair in writing and supply us with a proper residential delivery address and proof of residency at that address (ex: copy of driver license, state ID or copy of current residential utility bill- No PO Boxes can be used).  We will respond within 7 business days via email or written letter by US mail with the total amount owed and supply the Customer with a payment code to use on our website when paying for redelivery and associated costs/fees. Payment may be made via babidollhairco.bigcartel.com, PayPal, Money Order, Cashier’s Check or Western Union for re-stocking, repackaging and re-shipping the order. 

*After 60 days from the date of order transaction or 45 days of email notification to client concerning Undeliverable Order/ Refused Delivery, the items will no longer be reshipped and will be deemed a total loss to customer who did not respond to notifications. All funds are nonrefundable and hair extensions, eyelashes, and other hair goods will be sold. 

Return Exceptions:

Due to the nature of our product, health and hygienic standards, hair extensions are not returnable and are nonrefundable items once purchased. Additionally, hair extensions that have been worn, or altered in any manner will not be accepted for return or exchange; NO EXCEPTIONS. 

Mailing Exceptions:

• Important Your Billing Address and Shipping Address must be the same when making your order for shipping and payment purposes.
• ONLY SALON OWNERS can have their orders shipped to their salon address, other than their billing address.
• We do call to confirm your order for salon deliveries and we also conduct a Google web address verification to confirm it is your Salon.
• We reserve the reserve the right to request valid documentation to support and verify that the individual identifying themselves as a licensed cosmetologist, or Salon owner is who they say they are and can verify employment at the salon order(s) are to be mailed to.
• If there are any questions, please feel free to email us at babidollhair@gmail.com  we are always happy to help.

Accepted Methods of Payment
1. Credit Card (Visa, Master Card, Discover) 
2. Money Order 
3. Cashier Check
4. PayPal
5. Bank Wire
6. Western Union
• All orders are to be paid in US Currency
• *FL sales tax is applicable to all FL state orders.

*Note: Purchaser is responsible for all transaction and currency exchange fees associated with their purchase.

Credit Card Charges:

A Credit Card Authorization Form will be completed and signed by the customer and maintained on file by BDH.
Your credit card will be charged when you place your order. If we are not able to fulfill your order for any reason we will offer an exchange option for extensions of equal or greater value. (See cancellation policy)

Charge Backs:
Please note that we adhere to our polices strictly. There are no exceptions. By purchasing you are agreeing to the return and exchange policy. In the case of a client charge back, we will fight the charge back to the fullest extent. Our return and exchange policy is quite clear and forms a legally binding contact. Please ask all questions BEFORE purchasing.


Mailing Address for Cashier’s Check/Money Order:
Make Cashier Check/Money Order payable to Babi Doll Hair. All Cashier Checks/Money Orders must bear the signature of the Purchaser / Customer. 
     
Payment Address:    
Babi Doll Hair Co., LLC. 
244 Bilbao Street, Suite 507 
Royal Palm Beach, FL. 33411

International Orders:

Minimum order for all International orders: $30
*We prefer International orders to be paid using PayPal.

Holds may be placed on international credit card transactions, order processing will take longer, and we may require additional documentation.
Order Placement and Processing/Shipping Policy
Orders will be placed within 1-5 days of receipt of Individual, Hair Party /Group, Independent Distributor orders or Wholesalers payment or payment clearance. A confirmation email / invoice or handwritten invoice will be sent/ given to customer upon order and payment or deposit receipt unless there are extenuating circumstances that causes a delay.

All Babi Doll Hair Party Orders are submitted together upon final payment of all individuals/ participants in the BDH Party Group. 
As a courtesy, BDH may allow Group participants additional time to make deposit and final payments at no additional cost or BDH may allow Party Groups Participants to use the BDH Payment Plan under Payment Plan Policies. However, Babi Doll Hair Co. is not responsible for order delays and delivery delays due to participant’s use of additional time to submit their hair extension payments. 

The BDH Party Hostess throwing the party may opt to reduce the number of days needed to collect payments by submitting all payments at an earlier date than originally requested.

* Orders will be placed within 2-5 business days upon receipt of all participants’ full payments for Hair Party Groups. All Hair Party Group Extension orders are customized and made to order; therefore, all funds deposited or paid in full are nonrefundable after 24 hours of payment.  Please refer to Cancellation Policy above to see Terms. All individuals of the party group are bound by this agreement if they participate in a BDH Party; and assume risks of delays in the event that their Party Host (ess) allows or agrees to delays in their BDH Party’s payments. All party participants also agree to hold Babi Doll Hair Co., Company Officers, Company Partners, it’s Sales Representatives, Independent Sales Distributors, Affiliates, BDH Manufacturer, and legal representative(s) harmless for any delays in order submission, and delivery.  All Participants are responsible for carefully reading and understanding the terms and agreements before, during and after participating in a BDH Party and submitting deposits and or payment(s). We reserve the right to change our policies at any time and without prior notice.

Please note order processing may be impacted by holidays that our manufacture celebrates and the factory being closed.  This may cause a delay in placing the order and or shipment of your order. BDH is not responsible for delay due to National or International Holidays, International or US Customs holds and inspections nor delays related to domestic or international shipping carriers.  

• All orders are to be paid in US Currency
• Closures: Closures will be ordered “No Part” if style is not specified on Customer’s order.
• We welcome any questions or comments you may have. Please contact your Independent Sales Distributor directly or Babi Doll Hair Co. at babidollhair@gmail.com.

Carriers:

We use the following carriers to deliver our orders: 

USPS – US Postal Service
UPS
FedEx
DHL

Order Tracking

If a tracking # is provided by the shipping carrier, we will update your order with the tracking information. 

• Signatures are required for all order deliveries 

Shipping Rates:

The rate charged for the shipping of your order is based on the weight of your products, handling and your location. Before the final checkout page you will be shown what the cost of shipping will be, and you will have a chance to not place your order if you decide not to. 

• Customer’s are responsible for and required to add shipping preference and costs to their order(s)

International Shipping:
	
• We ship all international orders by USPS or UPS to residential or business addresses only; NO P. O. Boxes.
• Shipping costs and fees vary substantially depending on your location.
• We ship your package DDU, “Duties and taxes Unpaid” and do not collect VAT, duties and or/ taxes.
• You will be responsible for any of these types of potential charges that apply to your purchase.
• Contact your local Customs Office for any clarification, every country has different rules. 
• Minimum order for International is $30
• We reserve the right to refuse certain international orders based on individual circumstances.
• We are not responsible and purchaser agrees to hold BDH harmless for delays in shipping due to international mail and courier service.

Back Orders:

If an item goes on back order we will ship you the part of your order that is in stock. When the item becomes available we will ship you the rest of your order. You will not be charged any additional shipping and handling for the second shipment. 

Terms of Use: Submissions
We welcome your comments regarding the Babidollhairco.bigcartel.com Web site. However, any comments, feedback, notes, messages, ideas, emails, pictures, suggestions, referral lists: (names, addresses and telephone numbers) or other communications (collectively, "Comments") sent to Babidollhairco.bigcartel.com shall be and remain the exclusive property of Babi Doll Hair Co., LLC and Babidollhairco.bigcartel.com. Your submission of any such Comments shall constitute an assignment to Babidollhairco.bigcartel.com of all worldwide rights, titles and interests in all copyrights and other intellectual property rights in the Comments. Babidollhairco.bigcartel.com will be entitled to use, reproduce, disclose, publish and distribute any material you submit for any purpose whatsoever, without restriction and without compensating you in any way. For this reason, we ask that you not send us any comments that you do not wish to assign to us, including any confidential information or any original creative materials such as stories, product ideas, computer code or original artwork.
Privacy Policy
This policy covers how we use your personal information. We take your privacy SERIOUSLY and will take all measures to protect your personal information. 

What Information Do We Collect?

We only collect information that we need that is related to your order. This includes yours:
Credit Card Information/ Driver’s License #
Billing Address
Shipping Address
Email Address 
Client Referrals


How Is My Information Used?

Your information is only used to fill your order. We do not sell or redistribute your information to ANYONE unless initiated by the client’s request explicitly granting permission to share their information. For example, many BDH clients request referrals to stylists, stores or salons that carry and use BDH products. In an instance such as this, we request that you email a written request to babidollhair@gmail.com with your name, complete address, and telephone number and we will be happy to refer you to a stylist, salon or beauty store in closest proximity to you. Please note such requests are courtesies of BDH and in no way are endorsements of any particular stylist, salon, or store.  All due diligence requirements are at the onus of the customers. 

Cookies and Browser Information:

Cookies are small files that reside on your computer and allow us to recognize you on your next visit or store your shopping cart contents. We use them only to track this information.

name: Brazilian Straight
description: 100% Virgin Remy Brazilian Hair. Hair holds curls very well. Brazilian texture blends well with relaxed hair. Hair comes in a natural black-brown colors of 1, 1B, 2, and 4. Hair can be washed, dyed, curled, flat ironed, and blow dried. 100% Tangle Free. For Dolls who must have the finer things in life. 3.8-4 oz.

name: Brazilian Body Wave
description: Brazilian Body Wavy: 100% Unprocessed Brazilian Human Hair. This is the most desired and Premium Quality Brazilian Remy Body Wave Hair on the market. Brazilian hair is known for its Silky, Smooth and Wavy texture with medium luster. Hair can be washed, curled, flat ironed, and dyed. Hair blends well with relaxed hair, normal, full and wavy textures. This hair is versatile and can be worn, straight, wavy or curled. Tangle and Matte free. Weight: 3.8 – 4 oz

name: Brazilian Deep Wavy
description:
Brazilian Deep Wavy: 100% Luxurious Virgin Brazilian Hair. This hair has flowing Deep Wavy and full bodied curls throughout the length of the hair. This hair can be worn various ways, in its natural state; by misting with water and conditioner or by applying moose. For more volume simply separate the curls and you will have big full hair. This hair straightens well also using a flat iron.

 
*Please note, this hair is measured when straight to show its actual length. Due to the deep curls this hair has a shorter appearance, so we suggest purchasing longer lengths if a lengthier appearance is desired. Brazilian Deep Wavy measures 17 inches curled but 20 inches when straightened.

name: Brazilian Water Wave
description: Babi Doll Brazilian Water Wave is 100% Unprocessed Virgin Remy Hair. This hair is naturally wavy; wet or dry and can be styled in many ways: straight, wavy, or curled. Add more waves when wet by scrunching the hair in your hands. Moose may be used to hold firm waves throughout the day.

name: Brazilian Silky Curly
description: Brazilian Silky Curly-100% Virgin Remy Hair. This is the most desired and Opulent Brazilian Silky Curly Hair on the market. This type of Brazilian hair is known for its silky, smooth, and curly texture. Our Brazilian Silky Curly hair possesses a medium luster and can be washed, curled, flat ironed, blow dried, and colored. It blends well with relaxed, normal, full, and wavy textured hairs. This hair is versatile and can be worn naturally curly or straightened. Tangle and Matte free. Weight: 3.8 – 4 oz per weft.

name: Peruvian Straight
description: 100% Virgin Peruvian Straight Hair. This hair is unprocessed and naturally straight. Hair comes in natural black to brown colors of 1, 1B, 2, and 4.  Hair can be washed, blow dried, curled, and flat ironed. Hair texture blends well with normal, full and relaxed hair types. Tangle and Matte Free. Great way to add instant enhancement. Hair is tangle and matte free. Weight: 3.8-4 oz.

name: Peruvian Body Wavy
description: Peruvian Body Wavy: 100% Peruvian Human Hair. This is the most desired and Premium Quality Peruvian Remy Body Wave Hair available today. Peruvian hair is known for its Silky and Wavy texture with medium luster. Hair can be washed, curled, flat ironed, and dyed. Hair blends well with relaxed hair, normal, and full hair textures. This hair is versatile and can be worn straight, flat ironed or curled. Hair comes in natural black to brown color. Tangle and Matte free. Weight: 3.8–4 oz.

name: Peruvian Deep Wavy Hair
description: 100% Virgin Peruvian Hair. Deep Waves throughout these tresses gives drama to hair from root to end. Moose may be added to hold firm waves through out the day. Hair can be washed, blow dried, and flat ironed. Babi Doll Peruvian Hair comes in natural black to brown shades of 1, 1B, 2, and 4. Hair has low to medium luster and blends well with normal, full, curly, wavy, and relaxed hair.

name: Peruvian Wet Wavy
description: Babi Doll Peruvian Wet Wavy is 100% Remy Human Hair. The hair is naturally soft flowing wave pattern throughout the length of the locks. Hair comes in natural black to brown colors of 1, 1B, 2, and 4.  Hair can be washed, blow dried, curled, and flat ironed. Hair texture blends well with normal, full and relaxed hair types. This hair is versatile and can be worn in its naturally wavy state or wet. By misting water and light leave in conditioner and scrunching the hair adds additional wave. hair is matte and tangle free. Weight: 3.8-4 oz.

name: Peruvian Curly
description: 100% Unprocessed Peruvian Hair. This hair boasts natural Peruvian Curly Tresses. Babi Doll Peruvian Curly has fun and flirtatious Curls that will make you the star attraction at any event or simply for every day wear. Hair blends well with permed, normal and curly hair.  This hair has texture, yet is soft, and curly with nice luster. Can be washed, blow dried, dyed, and flat ironed. This hair straightens well. Weight: 3.8-4 oz

name: Indian Straight
description: 100% Virgin Remy Indian Hair. Blends nicely with permed hair, great addition to thin, normal or straight hair to add volume.  Can be washed, blow dried, dyed, and flat ironed. Babi Doll Straight Indian hair is soft and high to medium luster.  Hair is matte and tangle free. Weight: 3.8-4 oz

name: Indian Body Wave
description: 100% Virgin Remy Indian Hair. Hair is wavy and full of body. Hair has silky texture and high to medium luster. Blends well with normal, wavy, full or relaxed textured hair. Great for adding luscious soft textured volume. Babi Doll Indian Body Wave hair is matte and tangle free. Weight: 3.8-4 oz

name: Indian Curly
description:
100% Unprocessed Indian Curly Hair. Instantly change your look for everyday or formal occasions. Blends nicely with permed, normal and curly hair.  This hair is soft, and curly with good shine. Can be washed, blow dried, dyed, and flat ironed. This hair straightens well. Babi Doll Indian Curly hair is matte free and tangle free. Weight: 3.8-4 oz


*Please note, this hair is measured when straight to show its actual length. Due to the deep curls this hair has a shorter appearance, so we suggest purchasing longer lengths if a longer appearance is desired. Babi Doll Indian Curly measures 16 inches because of wave pattern but stretches to 18 inches when flat ironed.

name: Malaysian Silky Straight
description: 100% Unprocessed Malaysian Remy Hair. This Virgin hair is known for its long, strong and silky straight tresses. Hair can be washed, blow dried, dyed, curled and flat ironed. Babi Doll Malaysian Silky Straight Hair blends well with relaxed hair, normal, and full hair textures. This hair is versatile and can be worn straight or curled. Hair comes in natural black to brown colors of 1, 1B, 2 and 4. This Malaysian hair is known for its smooth texture with medium luster. It is tangle and matte free. Weight: 3.8–4 oz.

name: Malaysian Body Wave
description: 100% Virgin Malaysian Hair. Lovely waves towards ends of the hair. Can be washed, blow dried, dyed, curled and flat ironed. Malaysian hair is known for its smooth texture with medium luster. Hair can be washed, curled, flat ironed, and dyed. Hair blends well with relaxed hair, normal, and full hair textures. This hair is versatile and can be worn straight or curled. Hair comes in natural black to brown color. Comes in natural colors of 1, 1B, 2 and 4. Hair is tangle and matte free. Weight: 3.8–4 oz.

name: Malaysian Curly
description:
100% Virgin Malaysian Hair. 100% Unprocessed Malaysian Curly Hair. Instantly change your look to Glam. Blends nicely with wavy, normal and curly hair.  This hair is soft, and curly with medium luster. Can be washed, blow dried, dyed, and flat ironed. Hair straightens well. Weight: 3.8-4 oz

Notice: *Please note, this hair is measured when straight to show its actual length. Due to the deep curls this hair has a shorter appearance, so we suggest purchasing longer lengths if a longer appearance is desired. Babi Doll Malaysian Curly measures 16 inches because of wave pattern but stretches to 18 inches when flat ironed.

name: 100% Virgin Remy Closures
description: The 4x4 Closure is 1OO % Virgin Remy Hair. Using a closure is the best way to insure textures match. Keep extensions in longer by using a closure instead of leaving a portion of your natural hair outfrom your new extensions. Note, as our natural hair continues to grow the texture at the root may differ from the texture of the extensions. Closures eliminate the need to redo extensions as often .and maintains the same texture quality through your tresses.

name: Clip-Ins
description: Clip-Ins are 100% Virgin Remy Hair Extremely safe on natural hair. Hair can be dyed, curled and flat ironed. Great for increasing volume and length to hair.

name: Shipping - Domestic USA
description:
Our Least Expensive Way to Ship. US Postal Service First Class. 

Add insurance for your delivery (optional) if you desire.

* Packages Are NOT Insured
